title: The Mysterious Horse House
description: Keelaâ€™s twelfth birthday is 266 days away. She lives with relatives in an odd house built into a cliff, has never met her parents, and has no idea where they are. Her life is quite boring, since no one ever comes to visit. So, when tiny, mysterious, dancing lights lead her to a secret tunnel, and a talking pony shows up in the barn, Keela soon finds herself on the adventure of a lifetime.
author: Lisa Wysocky
